Entries.EntryText: Father has instructed you that you are to travel to Derik's home.  You should pass through the caves, being careful to stay on the main path.  You recall that there is a secret passage near a pond that takes you to behind a waterfall.  The part of the cave beyond the waterfall is often visited by the locals, but they have not discovered the hidden passage.  Only Derik has passed through.  The passage only works for some and only for those who believe it is real.  Continue on through caves to the Port Town.  Find Derik and he will have further instructions.
You did as your father asked and met with Derik for further instructions.

Aslan has instructed you, Melia, and Snowball to search out the secret entrance to the Queen Jadis' castle.  Snowball knows the area and your father's map shows the exact location of the entrance.  Find the Eyes of Knowledge in the treasure room and leave without being noticed.  Your Father's map shows where the secret door to the treasure room is located.  Meet back at the Cave of Knowledge for further instructions.
You returned to the Cave of Knowledge with the Eyes of Knowledge.
Elos has spoken to you in a dream.  He asked you to speak with your father, Adwen, immediately for further instructions.
You did as Elos commanded and spoke with your father, Adwen.
Seth has asked you to deliver a gift  to Haley Wendur.  She can most likely be found somewhere in Port Town (maybe the Wendur's home or around the town center).
You have given Haley the gift from your brother, Seth.
